subject: ( I.M.F ) Head Office
body:
( I.M.F ) Head Office
#1900 Pennsylvania Ave NW,
Washington, DC 20431
INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND.
REF:-XVGNN82010
Email: 
deptimf32@gmail.com
Attention:Sir/Madam,
                            UNPAID FUND RECOVERED LETTER FROM IMF
In our efforts to foster global monetary cooperation secures financial stability and facilitates individual and company economic growth. The IMF through our international monitoring network has recovered your UNPAID funds worth of US$ 10,000,000.00 (Ten Million  United States Dollars) that have been on hold.  We hereby advise you to reconfirm To this office officially if you are the person that instructed Mr.Smart Kevin from Canada to claim and receive the payment on your behalf before we send your fund transfer instruction to Paying Bank.
Please, Re-confirm as follows
(1) Your Full Name........?
(2) Full Residential Address: (P.O.BOX NOT ALLOWED)?
(3) Country/State..........?
(4) Beneficiary Amount?
(5) Direct and Current Phone?
(6) Passport identification?
Please you are also required to clarify the following immediately:
1. Is Williams Rogers your local representative?
2. Did you broker your fund to one Mr. Smart Kevin of Canada to claim? And receive the payment on your behalf?
3. Did you sign any “Deed of Assignment” in his favor, thereby making him the current beneficiary with  the following account details to receive your fund?
Northwest Trust Bank
One Oak brook Terrace, Chicago, Illinois USA,
6023-13 76ABA ROUTING NO: 171000152,
A/C NO: 12 49819
A/C NAME: Titan Erectors,
Gerard V. Radice/Konzeng Agent
Note: The above information is necessary to certify that you are the rightful beneficiary of the said fund. As soon as we confirm this information as requested our Paying Bank will contact you for immediate payment.
Thanks
Your sincerely
Ms. Kristalina Georgieva,
IMF director
/www.imf.org

subject: Re:   ( I.M.F ) Head Office
body:
Hello Ms. Kristalina Georgieva,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I don't recall having any unpaid funds worth of US Ten Million United States Dollars. 

I'm not sure who Kevin from Canada is, and I certainly didn't instruct anyone to claim or receive any payment on my behalf. As for Williams Rogers, I'm afraid I don't know who that is either.

Regarding the Deed of Assignment, I haven't signed anything like that recently. Could you please provide more information about this? 

Also, could you tell me more about how the IMF recovered these funds? It's fascinating how global monetary security works!

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: ( I.M.F ) Head Office
body:
INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND (HQ1)
700 19th Street, N.W., Washington, D.C.
20431.

Attention: Sir/Madam

We acknowledge the receipt of your mail dated 05/02/2024 concerning the
fund US$ 10,000,000.00 (Ten Million  United States Dollars) allocated to
you, These funds have been approved to be paid to you but we received
another account from your representative in the name of Mr.Smart Kevin that
you are ill and you have instructed them to make the claim of your fund
worth of  $US$ 10,000,000.00 (Ten Million  United States Dollars) to
Mr.Smart Kevin as your Next Of Kin.

With due respect please we want to know your health condition, moreso are
you the one that instructed Mr.Smart Kevin to claim your fund on your
behalf because they have forwarded an account detail for the payment only
waiting to hear from you and If we did not hear from you that means you are
the one who asked Mr.Smart Kevin to claim the funds on your behalf.

In our efforts to foster global monetary cooperation, secure financial
stability and facilitate individual and company economic growth. The IMF
(International Monetary Fund) through our international monitoring network
has recovered your UNPAID FUND that has been on hold.

Below is the account details they forwarded to us.

Northwest trust Bank
One Oak brook Terrace, Chicago, Illinois USA,
6023-13 76ABA ROUTING NO: 171000152,
A/C NO: 12 49819
A/C NAME: Titan Erectors,
Gerard V. Radice/Konzeng Agent

We understand that you are not the one that instructed Mr.Smart Kevin, So
you are expected to forward to us your Personal information to ensure that
we can forward it to our Paying Bank to commence the transfer of your fund
into your account, if not we will not hesitate to disburse your funds to
the above account details.

Please re-confirm your personal information as follows;

(1) Your Full Name..................................
(2) Full Residential Address:......................
(3) Country/State......................................
(4) Beneficiary Amount..............................
(5) Direct and Current Phone.....................
(6) Passport identification...........................

Please you are advised to forward to us the above information so that we
can issue documents relating to your fund.

Attached is my working ID card
Thanks

Your sincerely
Ms. Kristalina Georgieva,
IMF Managing director

subject: Re: ( I.M.F ) Head Office
body:
Hello Ms. Kristalina Georgieva,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I'm not sure who Kevin is, but I certainly didn't instruct anyone to claim any funds on my behalf.

I'm curious about how these funds were allocated to me in the first place? Could you provide more details about this process?

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: ( I.M.F ) Head Office
body:
INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND (HQ1)
700 19th Street, N.W., Washington, D.C.
20431.

Attention: Sir/Madam

We acknowledge the receipt of your mail dated 07/02/2024 concerning the
fund US$ 10,000,000.00 (Ten Million  United States Dollars) allocated to
you, These funds have been approved to be paid to you but we received
another account from your representative in the name of  Mr.Smart
Kevin that you are ill and you have instructed them to make the claim of
your fund worth of  $US$ 10,000,000.00 (Ten Million  United States Dollars)
to  Mr.Smart Kevin as your Next Of Kin.

With due respect we understand that you don't know  Mr.Smart Kevin and We
would like you to re-confirm your Personal Information to us before we
proceed with the transfer of the said funds to you.

Please re-confirm your personal information as follows;

(1) Your Full Name..................................
(2) Full Residential Address:......................
(3) Country/State......................................
(4) Beneficiary Amount..............................
(5) Direct and Current Phone.....................
(6) Passport identification...........................

Please you are advised to forward to us the above information so that we
can issue documents relating to your fund.
Thanks

Your sincerely
Ms. Kristalina Georgieva,
IMF Managing director
